webcrawler

Class WebCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • webcrawler.WebCrawler

  • public class WebCrawler
extends java.lang.Object
    Starts and managed the crawl process with corresponding crawl depth
    Author:
    Peter Hayes, Iain Ritchie

        Parameters:
        hTMLReader - The HTMLReader instance to be used
        tempURLList - The URLList to be used for temporary URLs
        finalURLList - The URLList to be used for final URLs

      • setMaximumDepth

        public void setMaximumDepth(int maximumDepth)
        Set the maximum depth of the crawler
        Parameters:
        maximumDepth - The maximum depth of the crawler, which should be greater than 0

      • getMaximumDistinctURLs

        public int getMaximumDistinctURLs()
        Get the maximum number of distinct URLs

        The maximum number of distinct URLs

      • setMaximumDistinctURLs

        public void setMaximumDistinctURLs(int maximumDistinctURLs)
        Set the maximum number of distinct URLs
        Parameters:
        maximumDistinctURLs - The maximum number of distinct URLs which should be at least 1

      • crawl

        public void crawl(java.lang.String url)
        Start the crawl from a URL
        Parameters:
        url - The base URL to start the crawl from
